alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:16AM EST until January 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following county, Cabarrus. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to remain elevated due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 812 AM EST, After yesterday`s heavy rainfall, flooding continues along the Rocky River. Remain wary of lingering flooding of low-lying areas along the river and select tributaries such as areas near the confluence of Dutch Buffalo Creek. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
